description: The Spring Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Spring Mountain for the snow report
Alexa, ask Spring Mountain for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Spring Mountain
shortDescription: The Spring Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Spring Mountain.
